experiences.title: Software Developer
points: Improved system reliability and accuracy for cardiology and interventional radiology clinicians by addressing critical issues through developing changes to their electronic medical record system

Reduced the number of clicks necessary for completing and reviewing procedural documentation by an average of 160 clicks per month for each user by displaying relevant medication administration data in line with documentation tools
Enhanced the maintainability of the system for all customers by migrating existing VB code to a new web-based platform
Facilitated a successful transition from SVN to Git for a team of forty developers by providing troubleshooting help and holding daily office hours
Resolved issues for end users transitioning from legacy systems at ten different customers by shadowing workflows on-site and collaborating with analysts at their organization
Maintained the quality and performance of a large, shared code base by reviewing over 250 changes and providing feedback on contributions from developers across multiple teams

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
points: Simplified troubleshooting of medication dispensing cart errors for large medical organizations by developing a fix for electrical interference-induced data corruption
Provided a reliable quality standard for software used by two embedded medical device systems by evaluating product requirements and creating automated software verification test procedures
Improved workflows for a team of developers by migrating code repositories from SVN to Git and creating virtual environment configurations that had all necessary dependencies

experiences.title: Optometric Technician
points: Completed preliminary visual acuity and eye health testing for patients by collaborating with a team of patient care professionals
Managed sensitive health information for all patients seen by adhering to HIPAA procedures and security guidelines
Supported optometrists conducting comprehensive medical eye exams for several patients daily by preparing and cleaning equipment

experiences.title: Paint Line Operator
points: Consulted with management and engineers to ensure strict quality guidelines and efficiency in the production process
Completed logistical and strategic operations to provide components to assembly line workers during second shift
